message.content:
Sure, here's how you can achieve this: ```css .container { display: flex; justify-content: flex-end; /* This will align the row of divs to the right */ } ``` Here is a brief explanation: - `display: flex;` makes the container a flex container. - `justify-content: flex-end;` aligns the flex items (the divs in this case) to the end of the flex container. This will push all the child elements to the right edge of the parent container. Here is an example of how you can use it: ```html
Div 1
Div 2
Div 3
``` In this case, `.container` is a flex container and all the child `div` elements will be pushed to the right edge of it.
